data.title: SGA Elections
data.text:
As the official voice of students at K-State, Student Governing Association would not be what it is without elections. SGA Elections every Spring Semester allow all Wildcats to cast their vote towards who they want to represent them in the following year. SGA plays a crucial role in your campus experience so making your voice heard is extremely important, whether it be casting your vote or running for an office yourself!

The 2024 SGA Elections have concluded and all officers have been elected and sworn in. If you are interested in getting involved in SGA before our next elections, consider joining our Emerging Leaders program or contact our SGA leadership team for more information.

SGA Elections are held Tuesday and Wednesday of the 6th week of the Spring Semester, so be on the lookout for important information and dates as we get closer to the 2025 SGA election.

Next SGA Election: Febrary 25-26, 2025.

Key Information:

Upcoming Dates

Check back soon for upcoming dates for the 2025 election!
